Secondly, that he dealeth not verie charitablie, in chargeing all thoÅ¿e that are not of his mind, to be Å¿oe foreÅ¿talled with preiudicate opinions, that though, by evidence of truth they be convinced, yet they will not be perÅ¿waded.
